page.title: 02LIFESTYLES IN PRIVETT AREA
page.content: The Privett Post Office and Store is the natural centre for news and the Postmistress is a mine of information.As well as the Post Office service she sells bread, milk, fresh & frozen groceries, greengrocery and everyday sundries. Her husband delivers bread, milk, groceries and the newspaper to the scattered homes in this area. Always welcomed he is often the only link with the older folk living alone and takes this responsibility very seriously. The nearest Doctor's surgery is at West Meon, 3 miles away. The nearest Policeman is at Petersfield, but is swift to answer a call for help. The Mobile Library calls fortnightly with an excellent selection of fiction and non-fiction for both adults and children.
